meanings.definition: To gain possession of something again.
meanings.sent1: After losing his favorite toy, Timmy reobtains it from under the bed.
meanings.sent2: She reobtains her lost keys by checking the pockets of her jacket.
meanings.sent3: The cat reobtains its spot on the sunny windowsill after the dog leaves.
meanings.sent4: Like a boomerang, luck reobtains its way back to those who believe in it.
meanings.sent5: The hero reobtains the magical sword, ready to face the dragon once more.

meanings.sent1: The explorer reobtains his compass before venturing into the unknown jungle.
meanings.sent2: She reobtains her stolen necklace from the pawn shop.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful professor reobtains his glasses after searching the entire classroom.
meanings.sent4: Hope reobtains its place in the hearts of the weary travelers.
meanings.sent5: The artist reobtains inspiration from the beauty of nature surrounding her.
